title: How to download music with album cover or picture - Quora

response.answer_text: If you download it legally it will come with all the tags and covers. If you use illegal methods to obtain songs and want all the correct tags and pictures you will have to do it yourself in itunes, google the artwork and cop and paste it into the song/s. If you do not use itunes, there is plenty of programs that find the album, song and artwork for you. Have a google search because there are quite a few, and they all specialise in slightly different things. I use a simple program called Musicbrainz picard if my tags and artwork need adding, but you have to find the artwork by a simple good search. There are programs that do it all for you though, like i said.

If you download “legitimately”, buying from Amazon, Apple, performer-self-publishers, or many other publishers, you’ll get the covers and pictures with the music. If you find some other source, you can use Google Images to find pictures of the performers, possibly including the album covers. But shame on you for ripping off performers and composers.

The easiest way to get the album art, is to download from music providers, such as Itunes, rhapsody, etc. Another method, is to download a free app called “Metatogger" this app makes tagging, and adding artwork, to mp3 files very easy. Album artwork, can be easily found, and downloaded, by looking up the artist or band's discography on wikipedia. I'd also like to add, there is no bundled software, i.e. malware, spyware, adware., and can also be used to add tags such as, band names, song titles, album, genre, and release year. I trust it to my computers, and have been using it for 4 years now.

One way I do it if the cover isn’t included is to import it (through your music player) by googling the album name and go to the pictures tab. Each image has dimensions shown (when hovered, if not clicked). For iTunes you want 500 x 500. But in general just even dimensions. A good thing about streaming or purchasing music through a service is the included artwork.
